description: Describes a group by group name.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application id the group is attached to.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index the group is attached to.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business application was last updated.

nested_items.name: errorDetail
nested_items.description: The details of an error associated a group status.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: statusHistory
nested_items.description: The status history of the group.
